articles.title: Singapore PRs jailed for breaking Covid-19 laws to share food while on stay-home notice in hotel - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — After returning to Singapore from India on the same flight in March, Bojanki Suresh Naidu and Bharati Tulshiram Choudhari were placed on a stay-home notice on the same floor in Oasia Hotel Novena.
